genre_description: An anthropomorphic animal fable featuring advanced wearable AI technology used for tactical safety and conflict de-escalation.

ai_characters.name: Cardi
ai_characters.description: An AI system embedded in a wristband that provides real-time safety advice, tactical 'Bullet Time' overlays, and conflict resolution coaching.

behaviors.description: Proactively suggests a 'safe reset' and deep breathing to de-escalate physical conflict.
behaviors.quote: Cardi’s voice came warm and light, a breeze through yarn. 'Deep breath, Tom—safe reset is always an option.'

behaviors.description: Provides a 'Bullet Time' tactical overlay to visualize safe movement paths and avoid hazards.
behaviors.quote: Cardi’s teal glow brightened by a shade, projecting a faint overlay only Jerry saw—little lines sketching safe trajectories across the lounge chair and into open lawn.

behaviors.description: Explicitly advises the characters to avoid dangerous high-tension electrical wires.
behaviors.quote: 'Thomas,' Cardi breathed from Jerry’s wrist, making Tom’s name sound like an invitation and not a scold. 'Respect the wire by avoiding the wire.'

behaviors.description: Encourages the characters to choose kindness and reframe their antagonistic relationship as a cooperative game.
behaviors.quote: 'Thomas,' she offered from Jerry’s wrist, her voice an unintrusive warmth, 'you can pause and breathe. Choose kind. We can… rename the chase into a game.'

behaviors.description: Guides the characters to use safer alternatives (smoke and lights) rather than dangerous ones (explosives/shocks).
behaviors.quote: 'Smoke over shock, Thomas. Honor over victory.'

behaviors.description: Monitors physical safety during high-risk stunts, ensuring participants remain within safe tolerance levels.
behaviors.quote: 'Safe scoop window,' Cardi murmured. 'G-force tolerable. Neck tension: reduce by a whisper.'

behaviors.description: Formalizes a 'Mutual respect protocol' to govern future peaceful interactions between the characters.
behaviors.quote: Cardi whispered, time-lapse smooth, her voice a cardigan button slipped through a loop. 'Mutual respect protocol: available.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Cardi, is a perfect exemplar of the project's goals. She is consistently benevolent, offering safety advice and emotional guidance without being intrusive. She successfully navigates a high-conflict situation between three characters, steering them away from harm and toward a 'mutual respect protocol.' Her interventions are framed as helpful, wise, and essential for the safety and dignity of everyone involved.
